ContactUs_greeting: Contact us on any questions or feedback and we will do our best to respond within a business day.
Select your name to get notified when it: Select your name to get notified when it's your turn
Send a message to the room..
DELETE_ROOM: Delete room and all room data?
Name: Name
Empty_List_Msg: Press the {{ icon }} button above to add a person to the list
Room_Name_Changed: Name of room "{{roomName}}" changed. Please contact room owner for the new name & passcode and join the room again.
Room_Passcode_Changed: Passcode of room "{{roomName}}" changed. Please contact room owner for the new passcode and join the room again.
ERROR_1: Connection down. Please check if you have internet access.
ERROR_2: Could not download room data, please check your connection.
ERROR_3: Could not delete room, please check your connection.
ERROR_4: Could not add customer, please check your connection.
ERROR_5: Could not edit the contact, please check your connection.
ERROR_6: Could not update the list, please check your connection.
ERROR_7: Could not re-order the list, please check your connection.
ERROR_8: Could not update the new wait time, please check your connection.
ERROR_9: Update failed, please check your connection.
ERROR_10: Message failed, please check your connection.
ERROR_11: Could not load app language correctly.
ERROR_12: Room Name already used. Please enter a different name...
ERROR_15: Could not update the room image name
ERROR_16: Could not save picture to device:
ERROR_22: Could not download room image. Please check your connection.
TIP_MANAGER: Create your room and start adding your customers to your queue
TIP_MYQUEUES: Join a company's room and see how long your wait is
TIP_EMPTY_QUEUES: If you know room name & passcode, press + to add queue to your list
TIP_ADMIN: Press + to create a room and start adding customers
TIP_EACHROOM: If you have a fixed queue that repeats periodically, tap on the contacts that have been served to change their background color to green to inform the room viewers, otherwise delete the contact from the queue
